title: Happy Birthday, Karin-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Karin-san, happy birthday!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Thank you, Kotori-chan. I’m glad you came to today’s party.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>It’s your birthday, after all, Karin-san, so Kotori has been looking forward to it. Kotori has also made some sweets, so please eat them. Ah, Kotori made these low in calories, so it’s fine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Your homemade sweets are really delicious, so I’ll look forward to them. I’ll definitely eat them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ah, but before that.... here’s your birthday present!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Waaah, thank you! May I open it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Of course!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>This necklace is....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ehehe, you said you liked it when the two of us went shopping the other day, right, Karin-san? Kotori thought it really suits you, so Kotori wants you to wear it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>You remember, huh.... I’m so happy.... Hey, Kotori-chan, can you help me put this necklace on? I want to wear it for today’s party!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
